name: landing-door-status
description: Represents BACnet Landing Door Status, which contains status information for landing doors at multiple floors in a lift (elevator) system.

fields.name: landing-doors
floor-number
fields.description: The floor number where the landing door is located.

fields.name: door-status
fields.description: The status of the landing door at this floor.
A series of landing door entries, each containing a floor number and the door status at that floor.
